messages.subject: images
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I am looking for pictures that I can get off the internet of samurai. I have already visited the samurai gallery but I am looking for pictures of samurai
messages.messageBody:
Hi, I am looking for pictures that I can get off the internet of
samurai. I have already visited the samurai gallery but I am looking for
pictures of samurai by themselves. No horses, just samurai and their
weapons. I would appreciate any help.
Thanks again
Sheldon


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
